Strings.Text: The power supply has been \nshutdown. It won't operate.{pause}
The power supply has been \nshutdown. It won't operate.{pause}
To operate this control terminal \nyou need the mechanic's ID {pause}{clear}card.{pause}
There is no response. To use \nthis elevator, you need to {pause}{clear}operate the control terminal next \nto the elevator.{pause}
The elevator's confirmation light \nis lit.{pause}
They left a small communication \ndevice on the desk.{pause}{clear}They must have used it to \ncommunicate with the other {pause}{clear}facilities.{pause}

Displayed on the screen of the 
terminal is the total amount of {pause}{clear}energy generated from this 
facility. They probably were {pause}{clear}planning to distribute the power 
using the computer.{pause}

It's a control terminal to check 
the operating status of the {pause}{clear}electrical generation of this 
facility. It appear as though they {pause}{clear}only have one generator to 
support the whole facility.{pause}

It's a control terminal to check 
the operating status of the {pause}{clear}electrical generation of this 
facility. It appear as though they {pause}{clear}only have one generator to 
support the whole facility.{pause}

It's a control terminal to check 
the operating status of the {pause}{clear}electrical generation of this 
facility. It appear as though they {pause}{clear}only have one generator to 
support the whole facility.{pause}

It's a control terminal to check 
the operating status of the {pause}{clear}electrical generation of this 
facility. It appear as though they {pause}{clear}only have one generator to 
support the whole facility.{pause}
Enter the 4 digit security code.{pause}{clear}Enter the first digit.\n{0x8000}0 {0x8001}1 {0x8002}2 {0x8003}3 {0x8004}4 {0x8005}5{0x3001}
Security code confirmed. You can \noperate the elevator.{pause}
The elevator's confirmation light \nis lit.{pause}
Incorrect Code. Will you enter the \ncode again?{0x3000}
It leads to the underwater \nfacility.{pause}{clear}Will you operate the elevator?{0x3000}
There's somthing underneath. \nYou've found a new DINO FILE.{pause}
